original_title: Movements arising from different relationships - Between regularity and irregularity II
overview: This is the second film in the series, ‘Between Regularity and Irregularity’. This work continues to focus on the fluctuations and changes of sounds, tone qualities, movement of particles, and forms. With regard to movements of particles, it uses movements triggered by living organisms such as the structures and cells in the brains of mice, as well as particles and lines in non-living things.
title: Movements arising from different relationships - Between regularity and irregularity II
